description: This file is an API client module for a fruit shop frontend application. It provides functions to retrieve environment variables, fetch product data (with mock fallback), fetch individual product details, and submit checkout orders. The code is designed to work with a configurable base URL and includes mock data for development or fallback scenarios.

methods.name: getEnv
methods.description: Retrieves an environment variable in the React environment, with an optional fallback.

methods.name: fetchProducts
methods.description: Fetches the list of products from the backend API, or returns mock data if the API is unavailable.

methods.name: fetchProductById
methods.description: Fetches a single product by its ID from the backend API, or returns mock data if the API is unavailable.

methods.name: submitCheckout
methods.description: Submits a checkout order payload to the backend API, or returns a mock confirmation if the API is unavailable.
